New Records: Buddy Hield set an NBA record for the most made 3-pointers through two games with a new team (12)
Key Match Events: Andrew Wiggins scored a game-high 29 points and made a game-best five 3-pointers in the Warriors' 112-104 loss to the Los Angeles Clippers
Buddy Hield scored 24 of his game-high 27 points in the first half of the Warriors' 127-86 victory over the Jazz
Hield moved to 21st on the NBA's all-time made 3-pointers list
Post-Match Reflections: Coach Kerr praised Buddy Hield's energy and shooting, saying 'He brings so much energy to the floor... He's one of the best shooters in the league.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: Warriors' top performers from Week 1 of the 2024-25 regular season
Buddy Hield compared the free-flowing Warriors offense to his college days at the University of Oklahoma
Others: Warriors' 140-104 victory over the Trail Blazers in Portland on Wednesday
Warriors' 127-86 victory over the Jazz in Utah on Friday
Warriors' 112-104 loss to the Los Angeles Clippers at Chase Center on Sunday
